attributes.value: Does not respect the law
Thinks friendship is important
Values tradition
Doesn't respect a society that has settled into harmony without debate and strife
Sees perseverance in the face of adversity as bull-headed and foolish
Values romance
Believes war is preferable to peace in general
Finds the pursuit of knowledge to be a waste of effort
Never becomes angry
Doesn't handle stress well
Does not enjoy participating in physical confrontations
Doesn't mind a little tumult and discord in day-to-day living
Is not driven and rarely feels the need to pursue even a modest success
Is grateful when others help her out and tries to return favors
Doesn't mind wearing something special now and again
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Always acts with mercy and compassion at the forefront of her considerations
Is incurious and never seeks out knowledge or information to satisfy herself
Tends to be a bit stubborn in changing her mind about things
Forms strong emotional bonds with others, at times to her detriment
Has a sense of duty
Never acts without prolonged deliberation, even to her own detriment and the harm of those around her
Tries to keep her things orderly
Strong
An iffy sense for music
